title: CIDER Baggy Jeans for Women High Waisted Wide Straight Leg Bow Jeans Denim Pants
description: Stylish Wide Leg Design: These jeans feature a trendy wide leg style that enhances a relaxed and effortless look, perfect for casual daily wear. The unique design allows for a comfortable fit, making them a great choice for any casual occasion

Distinctive Bowknot Detail: Featuring bowknot accents, these jeans stand out with a touch of charm and flair. The bowknot details add a playful and feminine element, transforming a classic pair of jeans into something truly unique

Durable Denim Fabric: Made from a blend of 85% cotton and 15% polyester, the denim fabric ensures long-lasting wearability. The moderate thickness makes them ideal for various weather conditions, offering both durability and comfort

Functional Pockets: Equipped with multiple pockets, these jeans provide practicality without sacrificing style. The pockets offer ample space for carrying essentials, making them a convenient choice for daily wear

Low Rise Fit: Designed with a low rise waistline, these jeans provide a modern silhouette that complements various body types. The oversized fit enhances comfort, making them an ideal choice for a relaxed, urban look
